comment: Had him for a 4-week summer course. It was very manageable like 1.5 hours of work everyday (lecture+lecture summary/quizzes/readings). The tests were very similar to what we learned in lectures and the study guide he posts on d2l. He was lenient with late/incorrect submissions and he responds to emails quickly. He gave me a great intro to psych.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Test heavy

comment: Honestly, the course was very hard, but he made it to where we actually understood the concepts. Make sure you find good study methods or you will learn some in this class because it is CONTENT HEAVY! But, to make your life easier - take him. Pop quizzes, but gives you a second try on them!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Respected--Lecture heavy

comment: I have never written a review on this site but I created an account just to say that Tim Martin is the best professor I've had in all four years at KSU. Pop quizzes but he goes through the answers and gives you a retake, study guides are exactly what you need for the tests, and his lectures are engaging and actually teach you stuff. 10/10.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: Great teacher. Wants all his students to succeed.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Accessible outside class

comment: The content of this class is hard and not fun and his tests are fairly hard, but 2 attempts on quizzes and gives u answers so easy. Had to read a book and do chapter summaries, also not hard...easy grader. Lots of material so def need to study for the tests but he does a curve. He is very laid back and can be funny. Don't stress, you will be fine!
rating_tags: Hilarious--Accessible outside class

comment: This was the hardest class in terms of content that I've ever taken. If it wasn't for Dr. Martin, I wouldn't have passed. In fact, I finished with a 100 in the class. He is very lecture-heavy but loves answering questions and having discussions about the content. He'll administer random quizzes throughout the semester but gives two attempts on them
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Hilarious--Lecture heavy

comment: There are only a few assignments for the entire class (quizzes, chapter summaries, tests). He's a very easy grader. The content of the course can be difficult to understand so it is best to show up to class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Graded by few things

comment: Great and very very nice man. The class itself is heavy and needs a lot of studying and notes. He makes it easier and a bit more understandable. Exams are kind of difficult but just study. He gives pop quizzes but gives two chances and goes over it after the first chance. Highly recommend, he was super chill.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Hilarious--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Dr. Martin is amazing! This class has difficult content and a lot of it so be prepared to work hard but he is great at teaching it. The cumulative tests are difficult, but he gives two chances on quizzes which is helpful. Definitely be prepared to work hard and memorize a lot but he is just a great professor with a lot of good experience.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Beware of pop quizzes--Caring

comment: Prof Martin is not a bad guy. He will give pop quizzes after the completion of ppts but he gives the answers before the 2nd attempt. Note Heavy, tests are cumulative which I did not like. Must take tests and quizzes in class. Not an impossible class by any means but if your memory recall isn't great beware.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment:
he doesnt take attendance but quizzes are given in the beginning of classes, you take it once by yourself, he reviews it and gives you the answers, and then you can take it again
he only grades tests and quizzes
rating_tags: Participation matters--Beware of pop quizzes--Graded by few things

comment: Oh my goodness, Dr. Martin is an amazing professor! He answers emails quickly, has entertaining but impactful lectures, wants you to succeed, and is just a great person in general. Psychology isn't an easy subject, but he breaks it down in a way that's really easy to understand! And if you don't, he is always open to questions. Take him!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Amazing lectures --Hilarious

comment: He is honest about the work and the effort you need. He really wants you to learn and succeed in his class. If you need help,have questions,or need more time,email him, he will work with you. Dr. Martin provides you with all the materials you need to succeed. He demonstrates  SPSS in class and is willing to do it many times. Take this class!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Took Professor Martin for a Maymester and he was great. Just make sure to keep up with your reading and studying so you don't lose points.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I took this course for a two week semester. Professor Martin is a really great professor. His syllabus is very helpful toward keeping you on track. He is very knowledgeable. He is really nice.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment:
To be completely honest, this is a difficult course. However, Professor Martin is a great teacher. He makes the class so that the information is a bit easier to understand. The exam study guides outline everything that can be on the test.
4 tests (lowest gets dropped), and the tests are curved. 10 quizzes and 10 article summaries (easy 100s).
rating_tags: Graded by few things

comment: Tim is an amazing professor, I have nothing bad to say about him. There were 4 exams and you could drop the lowest grade (potentially not have to take the final) so make sure you study and do well on the first 3. We had a lot of quizzes and article summaries but they were all easy 100s. TAKE HIM IF YOU CAN!!
rating_tags: Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: Honest, funny, responds to emails quite quickly, helpful, and caring. There is quite a bit of content, but if you pay attention and do a bit of studying, you'll do well in the class. He knows his stuff pretty well, so if you have any questions or need any help you can always go to him and ask. He is accessible inside and outside of the classroom.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Hilarious--Accessible outside class

comment: This is a hard class but he was so helpful. He will go over topics as many times as you need and wants his students to succeed. I think he is the best professor for this class. He seems intimidating at first but I promise he isn't! He is actually funny too. TAKE HIM!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes--Caring

comment: Amazing prof, take him! No textbook needed, he has a lecture video for every topic, all you have to do is watch it and take notes plus read an article and write a summary, which he doesn't grade for accuracy. best grading policy, gives you answers for quizzes, test grades curved so that the highest test grade is a 100. Taking him next semester.
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Hilarious

comment: The class itself is a difficult, boring class. He is a very sweet man. Responds quickly to emails. One mandatory book that reads more interesting than normal textbooks. 3 tough exams-he usually curves about 10 points, one chapter summary every week, and 5 pop up quizzes-Bonus: He lets you immediately "retake" after going over answers in class.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: I failed this course with another professor and I thought my chances of understanding the material was very slim, until I took a face to face course with Professor Martin. Please be sure to sit in front of the class and ask all questions that are needed. There are very few assignments but he does give pop quizzes. He also gives good feedback.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: This professor is really kind and understanding! He genuinely wants his students to understand the content. He curves tests/questions when people don't do well on the test or a specific question. No textbook needed. We really just had like one quiz each week and then 3 exams throughout the semester. He gives study guides. Tests were somewhat hard
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Dr. Martin breaks complicated topics down so their understandable. Hard tests but good review sheets that cover everything. Perception was not what I expected but great class anyway.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: The curriculum in this course was presented well and was very interesting. However, I found that he would make very controversial remarks about religion and societal problems that had little to do with lectures. This is certainly a personal problem I had with the course but nonetheless found it bothersome. Descent professor with reasonable workload
rating_tags: Test heavy--Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy

comment: Tim is probably one of the funniest and most real professors I've ever had. I took the class online. There were 3 non lockdown tests, practice quizzes ( you have unlimited tries), and a pre/post assessment. Prof Martin is very knowledgable and is willing to help. He responds very fast to emails and overall made the class fun. would reccommend.
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Hilarious

comment: Professor Martin is one of the best professors I've ever had. I took his 4 week session class this summer and made an easy A. There were 2 tests, online quizzes, and one discussion post graded for completion. You have to watch the lectures and read the textbook in order to do well. Gives study guides for test. Also curves tests & gives extra credit
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I took the 4-week online summer class. 2 Tests, online quizzes, and discussion board (for completion grade). He offers extra credit also. His recorded lectures did put me to sleep but other than that I studied the powerpoints and completed the study guide to prepare for the tests. For the test you do need to understand the concepts to do well.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Only grades are exams, online quizzes (for completion, not for accuracy) and discussion posts. Tests questions are more on the "applied" side rather than straight memorization, 6/10 in terms of difficulty in my opinion. Pretty much a B or C if you put in minimal to "some" effort. An A requires some work. Curves tests & gives extra credit!

Professor Martin is one of the best professors I have ever had. I took him for 4 classes while at Tech and genuinely learned so much during them. He makes lectures interesting which helps you remember all the content. He does a lot of simulations which are super helpful.
rating_tags: Respected--Participation matters--Group projects

comment: Professor Martin is one of the best professors I have ever had. I took him for 4 classes while at Tech and genuinely learned so much during them. He makes lectures interesting which helps you remember all the content without even needing to study much. I highly suggest taking any of his classes!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: There are four exams, online surveys you have to take, and that's it. If you don't show up to lecture you'll be confused when looking back at the powerpoints. You have to work for your grade but it's doable.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Test heavy--Lecture heavy

comment: Tests: straight from the powerpoints, just attend. He post lecture slides but if you do not attend they do not make sense. Gives a study guide before each exam USE IT. You will only need your book to answer them sometimes. Research: complete 3 credits (so easy just answer a few surveys) TAKE PICS WHEN HE GOES OVER THE EXAMS AND PRE-TEST!!!!!!!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I've taken Professor Martin 3 times now. He gives a lot of opportunities for extra credit. He curves all test grades and drops your lowest grade. He's really helpful. You can email him or go see him in his office if you have questions.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Dr. Martin teaches very challenging material, but he gives you so many chances to get it right, you can't fail. He has very high expectations, but if you come to class you should be fine. I wish he taught senior sem.
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read

comment: Hes a cool dude, but his hybrid class is the least efficient one Ive taken. Every lecture is online, recorded years ago, and he consistently lets class out an hour early because he does no in class lecturing. It feels like the course is designed to allow him to do as little work as possible; he even takes forever to grade assignments.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Beware of pop quizzes--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: The best! If you get the chance to take him, do it! He gives clear study guides and answers all questions. Encourages you to visit office hours- especially if you are struggling. He offers extra credit and curves the test grades so that the lowest grade is always 100%. He is brilliant!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Clear grading criteria

comment: Tim Martin was an amazing teacher. He was extremely laid back and definitely cares about his teaching and his students.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Caring

comment: Professor Martin is a really good teacher. The content is hard, but he makes getting an A easy. He curves the tests, drops your lowest test grade, and gives a lot of extra credit.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Beware of pop quizzes--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Martin is a real cool guy, although he can be sarcastic on feedback for your homework. As long as you go to the lectures and email him when you need help, you should be fine.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Hilarious

comment: This guy is awesome! Very happy he is my professor. This is a hard class so make sure you get a good professor like Dr. Martin.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Dr. Martin is easily the best professor I've had at KSU so far. He is incredibly smart and a great teacher. His class was certainly not easy but go to his office hours and he always always always will help you. I also walked away from this class with a genuinely good understanding of truly difficult material. So happy I took him.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Honestly, he is one of the best professors that I have had so far in Kennesaw. He actually teaches you and helps you with anything. I had him for Research Methods as well. If you're just a student trying to slack and go by, do not take him. I really enjoyed his class!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Bc of the nature of the class and bc it is a lab, you need to go to class for sure. Martin is a genuinely caring and cool professor. Class time passes quickly bc hes funny. Communicate with him if you are struggling and he will do all he can to help to help you pass. Never be afraid to ask questions. Hes awesome and wont make you feel stupid.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Failed this class with another professor, who didn't want to help out if you didnt understand something, but Dr. Tim was so patient, and really wants you to learn. I was worried I was never going to pass this class and have to change majors, but I passed thanks to him.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Tim is absolutely ridiculous with the amount of homework he assigns. Makes this course way too hard, would definitely NOT recommend, ended up having to drop.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--TEST HEAVY--Tests are tough

comment: Dr. Martin is a brilliant teacher, but this class is NO JOKE. I made an A, but I really had to work for it - meeting with the TA, emailing back and forth with Dr. Martin, doing the extra credit, and studying like crazy. The tests are EXTREMELY DIFFICULT, but that's the nature of the material. I would recommend this class, but you have to work hard.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Take him he's my favorite professor at KSU,genuinely cares for his students and goes way out of his way to help them and frequently mentors students for graduate school. He is someone you should definitely take before you graduate. You earn your grade but he curves test and gives extra credit. Makes the stats part understandable for non math minds!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Love this man, he is genius. He truly cares about his students. He has a laid back teaching style as opposed to a really structured class but you will come out having learned what you should have. He offers 1/2 a letter grade of extra credit if you participate in his studies or write a paper. He's a great guy and a highly respected Professor at KSU
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Inspirational

comment: He has a funny personality, and knows what hes talking about. The material is NOT easy, and he gives you a ton of work, but if you pay attention and don't procrastinate on it, you should be okay. Tests are hard, & the homeworks are a ton of work. lectures online.. WATCH THEM BEFORE CLASS... theres a chance of a quiz on them each class.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Dr. Martin is awesome! This class is very difficult and you will not get by with minimum effort, but you really do learn the material. Do the study guide and take the homework seriously. He makes himself extremely available to help, and he is always willing, no matter how dumb you feel you question is. I definitely recommend taking him!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Great professor, gives lots of chances to do well. I loved the eeg lab. Always willing to help.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: I cannot tell you how this man changed my life. I'm getting ready to graduate with a minor in stat because of him, and I already have a job offer!  Takes a while to get papers back, and his comments can be a little mean sometimes, but I took two more classes from him and you really do learn.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Hilarious--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: This class is already extremely hard however, he always helps if you need it. Will go over things you do not understand in class. I took this as a hybrid and loved it. A lot of work but he is willing to help. Do the study guide and you'll be fine.
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--TEST HEAVY--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: He seems like a really nice guy, but physio is a really hard class with all this material and he really doesn't make it any easier.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Dr. Martin is an incredible asset to KSU. He goes ABOVE AND WAAAAAY BEYOND to help those who truly want to help themselves. He's extremely knowledgeable, fair, considerate and SUPER helpful. This is not an easy class by any means. You're going to need to study but Dr. Martin is more than willing to help you figure it all out. So happy I took him!

If you want to REALLY AND TRULY learn something take him! If you plan on being lazy and just want to get by then i suggest not to take him. Funniest teacher ever, so sweet and really love to teach and help his students. You will LEARN your "A" not earn it. Make sure you listen to all lectures and do all tutorials.

He is AMAZING!!!! By far my favorite professor. I have learned SO much from him, and I reap the benefits in ALL of my psych classes, not just research methods and experimental. It can definitely be a challenging class but it will make you a better student and your psych skills will improve profoundly. Taking this class makes future classes easier.

Dr. Martin teaches brutally difficult classes and is aware of how difficult his classes are. He is above and beyond helpful and truly cares about the education of his students. I took this class as a hybrid, lectures are recorded and online, the lab is in class. I wish I had taken research methods in the same format. One of my favorite professors.

Research is hard but he gets you through it. Ask questions. Be read for quiz every week. If you watch the lectures you will be fine. Papers aren't long. He gives great study guide. Drops lowest test. You'll have to work but he is the best prof to take for this class. Don't be afraid of the hybrid aspect. It worked for me just fine. I got an A!

He is the best prof I've had. Hawaiian shirts & socks n' sandals sets the mood for a laid-back,but learning heavy classroom. Dr. Martin will answer all your questions without making you feel stupid. Sign up for extra credit ASAP & the end of your semester will be less stressful. Go to his office hours. He WANTS to help you, so don't be a slacker.

He is AMAZING!!!!!!! This class was hard but it made me appreciate psychology more. I learning my grade not earning it. This is hybrid and all lectures are online and labs are in class. He is funny and has an open door policy.

Have anything you are unsure about? Just ask him and he will clarify it for you. He is very open to questions and doesn't make you feel dumb for asking. I would take him again. Expect to study for his exams (and he does drop a test). Don't miss class and do all the assigned homework and you'll do fine.

I love him! Gives extra credit! Very helpful with homework & other things you don't understand, just ask! He is kind of sarcastic but don't take it personal! Papers are short. Lectures are posted! & you probably need to purchase the book, especially the APA format book (very helpful). Quizzes & test are short; study, pay attention, ask for help!

He was absolutely amazing! He is a very helpful teacher that will help students who find help for themselves! He is amazing professor who is truly compassionate about helping other. This man is an amazing teacher, and one of my favorite at KSU!

There will be a quiz for each time there's a reading assignment. SO READ. Really helpful and will probably have extra credit assignments to help anybody out who isn't doing to well. Go to study sessions with the TA. He is extremely helpful and i would highly recommend him.

Dr. Martin is a fabulous professor. He goes out of his way to help, he makes study guides for the tests, grades tests in the same day, gets all of your work back to you immediately and offers extra credit. You have to read and go to class but that's typical for research methods.

Great guy and great teacher! He's more than willing to help if you ask. The class was 3 hours but went by fairly quickly since you're working the entire time (he'll crack a few jokes and give a short break, usually). You'll have 4 quizzes over readings, 3 mandatory tests (plus an optional 4th), and a weekly  HW assignment. He's tough on grammar!!
I really enjoyed Dr. Martin.  He was very laid back and so willing to help.  Yes he can be tough but as long as you do the work and ask for help you will be fine.

He seems intimidating and hard at first, but he is very helpful, and great at helping you to understand the material. He also cracks a lot of jokes, which can lighten up a 2hr45min class on statistics and research. I absolutely recommend him.

I anted to take Dr. Martin after seeing all the good reviews but I was shocked once I was in his class. He isn't any where close to the descriptions on here. He is extremely hard & seems to never stay on track which is very confusing. Many of us are struggling right now. I got an A in Research Methods but he makes you feel like you never took it.

Class is super hard but you have to take it for a psych major so I recommend taking it with him! If you fail its on you, he is willing to help with everything and is extremely clear on instructions. 4 tests, drops the lowest, many quizzes but over the same stuff usually. Youll do well if you come to class and actually try!

Dr. Martin is extremely intelligent, take him if you want to expand your knowledge. If you are looking for an easy A look elsewhere. Class takes A LOT of effort, but he is extremely helpful if you go to his office. Read the assigned material, there WILL be a quiz next class over it, and the quizzes are hard.

Great Professor. This class is very hard, but Dr. martin knows that and makes sure to go into details about everything. Do the work and approach him if you are not clear about something. He is very helpful. Loved his teaching style!

Dr. Martin is always willing to help. This class is not easy, it requires A LOT of work. But he tries his best to help. 4 tests, and he drops the lowest. Class consists of Quizzes, homework, and extra credit. I would recommend him, but don't think it's going to be an easy A!
Great professor, extremely smart.  Very reasonable with timelines and extra credit.  Curves test grades highest score up to 100.  Very manageable assignments.
Awesome professor. Probably one of the most underrated psych professors at KSU. Come prepared to work and learn. This guy should have more ratings.

Not sure what happened this semester, but I don't think I've ever been more unsatisfied with a class. He was out the first month of class then never seemed to care about class. He didn't even look at the book we were assigned so our reading assignments hardly went along with the book. Often posted reviews and lectures late.

Dr. Martin is one of the best professors I have had at KSU. He is very helpful and listens to his students. This is a tough class but I do recommend taking him because he will HELP you through it! 4 exams and he drops the lowest. a lot of homework but very helpful with your grade if you do it right. DO THE EXTRA CREDIT!!!! trust me on this it helps
Excellent teacher.  His goal is for students to succeed.  Always willing to help with any problems you may have.

An absolutely amazing Professor. The class was very hard, because there was A LOT of reading involved. Tests are easy, as they come directly from the study guide. He is EXTREMELY helpful and is ALWAYS available. Do your work, turn it in on time and you will have an A. I never thought it would have been possible, but it is :) TAKE HIM!!!!

LOVE LOVE LOVE Dr. Martin! He's SO smart, can answer nearly any question you have! I LOVE taking his class! He's not going to give you grades, but he's so willing to help you in every way! He's one of the BEST professors I've ever had! TAKE HIM if you get the chance!

He really knows what he is talking about and tries to make the class interesting. Tests were easy, because study guides were completed in class and VERY helpful. There are a lot of assignments, but this is meant to be a challenging class. No mandatory attendance, drops lowest test grade, and gives extra credit. Take him if you have the chance!

His class can be fun but he speeds through his powerpoints to the extend that you can't keep up. Very knowledgable. Good sense of humor. He cancels class randomly just for fun it seems like. His tests are fair, his study guides are actually useful. Grades papers lenient. Take Him!

Dr. Martin is the best professor I've ever taken at KSU. He is so knowledgeable and respectful and willing to help any student. Also, he is extremely laid back and understands that sometimes students are going to be late to class. He really tries his hardest to make sure every student learns, too! Awesome class!
Best professor at KSU. There aren't enough positive adjectives. Take him if you have the chance!

Great teacher, he was so willing to answer questions whenever needed, made material basic and understandable....if you have to take experimental take it with Dr Martin, best teacher teaching it at Kennesaw
